intro: Delosperma gracillimum, commonly known as the slender ice plant, is a succulent shrub native to South Africa. It features fleshy, upright stems covered in small, blue-gray leaves that help reduce water loss. The plant produces vibrant pink to purple flowers in spring, which are clustered in dense inflorescences. It is well adapted to arid environments and thrives in full sun with well-drained soil. Its compact growth habit makes it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
